parameters.name: Auth
parameters.description: The caller authentication status of the API. Valid values: **ok**: The authentication is successful. **mismatch**: The request is redirected. **servicenotfound**: A request error occurred. **Unknown**: An unknown error occurred.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group.

parameters.name: RawMonitorGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the monitoring group.
